scripts.migrate-local: set -a && source ../__environment__/.local.env && set +a && knex migrate:latest --env local
scripts.migrate-dev: set -a && source ../__environment__/.dev.env && set +a && knex migrate:latest --env dev
scripts.migrate-prd: set -a && source ../__environment__/.prd.env && set +a && knex migrate:latest --env prd
scripts.rollback-local: set -a && source ../__environment__/.local.env && set +a && knex migrate:rollback --env local
scripts.rollback-dev: set -a && source ../__environment__/.dev.env && set +a && knex migrate:rollback --env dev
scripts.rollback-prd: set -a && source ../__environment__/.prd.env && set +a && knex migrate:rollback --env prd
scripts.seed-local: set -a && source ../__environment__/.local.env && set +a && knex seed:run --env local
scripts.seed-dev: set -a && source ../__environment__/.dev.env && set +a && knex seed:run --env dev
scripts.seed-prd: set -a && source ../__environment__/.prd.env && set +a && knex seed:run --env prd
